messages.content:
My love.
It has officially
been a year of
our relationship. 
I knew you for longer,
but a year ago we
said the words
on a Discord call.
It was a wild year,
and a lot had
happened; we shared
laughter and sadness
alike. From the moment
I started chatting
with you, I knew
you were different.
But I had no idea
how much you'd mean
to me and how far
we'd come. It seems
like yesterday I was
sitting on that call,
almost shaking from
what was about to come.
I'm really thankful
for you, everything
you do, and everything
you are. This day
belongs to us.
Unfortunately, we are
far away from
celebrating it
properly, but you're
always close in my
heart. I love you,
my dearest; happy
anniversary, and I
love you so much
more than I can
express
